languages.text: "Возражение: поведение Лорд-капитана отличается от стандартного выражения чувств. Гипотезы: ксенос лжет, Лорд-капитан лжет, присутствует неизвестная переменная. Для установления истинной природы данного явления требуются дополнительные наблюдения".

"Objection: the Lord Captain's behaviour differs from the standard expression of feelings. Hypotheses: (a) the xenos is lying; (b) the Lord Captain is lying; or (c) there is an unknown variable. Further observations are required to establish the true nature of this phenomenon."
languages.original_text: "Возражение: поведение Лорд-капитана отличается от стандартного выражения чувств. Гипотезы: ксенос лжет, Лорд-капитан лжет, присутствует неизвестная переменная. Для установления истинной природы данного явления требуются дополнительные наблюдения".

languages.text: “反对：舰长大人的行为与标准的情感表达方式有所不同。假设：（a）异形在说谎；（b）舰长大人在说谎；或（c）存在未知变量。需要进一步观察以确定该现象的真正性质。
languages.original_text: "Objection: the Lord Captain's behaviour differs from the standard expression of feelings. Hypotheses: (a) the xenos is lying; (b) the Lord Captain is lying; or (c) there is an unknown variable. Further observations are required to establish the true nature of this phenomenon."

traits.locale_text: “反对：舰长大人的行为与标准的情感表达方式有所不同。假设：(a)异形在说谎；(b)舰长大人在说谎；或(c)存在未知变量。需要进一步观察以确定该现象的真正性质。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Objection : le comportement {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} diffère de l'expression des sentiments ordinaire. Hypothèse : (a) la xénos ment ; (b) {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} ment ; ou (c) il existe une variable inconnue. De plus amples observations sont requises pour établir la véritable nature de ce phénomène. »
languages.original_text: "Objection: the Lord Captain's behaviour differs from the standard expression of feelings. Hypotheses: (a) the xenos is lying; (b) the Lord Captain is lying; or (c) there is an unknown variable. Further observations are required to establish the true nature of this phenomenon."

traits.locale_text: « Objection : le comportement {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} diffère de l'expression des sentiments ordinaire. De plus amples observations sont requises pour établir la véritable nature de ce phénomène. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Objeción: el comportamiento de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán difiere de la expresión de sentimientos estándar. Hipótesis: (a) la xenos miente; (b) {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán miente; o (c) hay una variable desconocida. Se requiere una observación más prolongada para determinar la naturaleza exacta de este fenómeno».
languages.original_text: "Objection: the Lord Captain's behaviour differs from the standard expression of feelings. Hypotheses: (a) the xenos is lying; (b) the Lord Captain is lying; or (c) there is an unknown variable. Further observations are required to establish the true nature of this phenomenon."

traits.locale_text: «Objeción: el comportamiento de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán difiere de la expresión de sentimientos estándar. Hipótesis: (a) la xenos miente; (b) {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán miente; o (c) hay una variable desconocida. Se requiere una observación más prolongada para determinar la naturaleza exacta de este fenómeno».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「反論：ロード・キャプテンの行動は、標準的な感情表現とは異なる。仮説：(a)異種族が嘘をついている、(b)ロード・キャプテンが嘘をついている、(c)未知の変数が存在する。この現象の真相を解明するには、さらなる観測が必要である」
languages.original_text: "Objection: the Lord Captain's behaviour differs from the standard expression of feelings. Hypotheses: (a) the xenos is lying; (b) the Lord Captain is lying; or (c) there is an unknown variable. Further observations are required to establish the true nature of this phenomenon."

traits.locale_text: 「反論：ロード・キャプテンの行動は、標準的な感情表現とは異なる。仮説：(a)異種族が嘘をついている、(b)ロード・キャプテンが嘘をついている、(c)未知の変数が存在する。この現象の真相を解明するには、さらなる観測が必要である」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Einspruch: Das Verhalten des Lord Captains weicht von der standardmäßigen Art und Weise ab, Gefühle auszudrücken. Hypothesen: (a) die Xenos lügt; (b) der Lord Captain lügt; oder (c) es gibt eine unbekannte Variable. Weitere Beobachtungen sind erforderlich, um das wahre Wesen dieses Phänomens zu verstehen."
languages.original_text: "Objection: the Lord Captain's behaviour differs from the standard expression of feelings. Hypotheses: (a) the xenos is lying; (b) the Lord Captain is lying; or (c) there is an unknown variable. Further observations are required to establish the true nature of this phenomenon."

traits.locale_text: "Einspruch: Das Verhalten des Lord Captains weicht von der standardmäßigen Art und Weise ab, Gefühle auszudrücken. Hypothesen: (a) die Xenos lügt; (b) der Lord Captain lügt; oder (c) es gibt eine unbekannte Variable. Weitere Beobachtungen sind erforderlich, um das wahre Wesen dieses Phänomens zu verstehen."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "Objection: the Lord Captain's behaviour differs from the standard expression of feelings. Hypotheses: (a) the xenos is lying; (b) the Lord Captain is lying; or (c) there is an unknown variable. Further observations are required to establish the true nature of this phenomenon."

languages.text: "İtiraz ediyorum. Lord Kaptan'ın sergilediği davranışlar, hislerin standart dışa vurumundan farklılık göstermektedir. Hipotezlerim: (a) zeno yalan söylemektedir, (b) Lord Kaptan yalan söylemektedir veya (c) bilmediğimiz bir değişken vardır. Bu fenomenin asıl mahiyetinin tespiti için ileri gözlem gerekli."
languages.original_text: "Objection: the Lord Captain's behaviour differs from the standard expression of feelings. Hypotheses: (a) the xenos is lying; (b) the Lord Captain is lying; or (c) there is an unknown variable. Further observations are required to establish the true nature of this phenomenon."

traits.locale_text: "İtiraz ediyorum; Lord Kaptan'ın sergilediği davranışlar, hislerin standart dışa vurumundan farklılık göstermektedir. Hipotezlerim şöyledir; (a) zeno yalan söylemektedir; (b) Lord Kaptan yalan söylemektedir veya (c) bilmediğimiz bir değişken vardır. Bu fenomenin asıl mahiyetinin tespiti için ileri gözlem gerekmektedir."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
